DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : CALABASAS-BASED NTS WINS $ 3.1-MILLION CONTRACT
DOC.TEXT: National Technical Systems has been awarded a $ 3.1-million contract for 110 circuit_breakers for Pacific Gas & Electric ' s nuclear_power plant at Diablo Canyon . Calabasas-based NTS will manufacture and install the circuit_breakers . It is estimated that the total market for circuit_breaker replacement at nuclear_power plants in the United States is $ 500 million .
